summary: This document is a deposit account resolution for Requiro Scientia LLC at Fifth Third Bank. It outlines the authority granted to specific individuals for managing the company's bank accounts, including the ability to execute transactions and manage funds. The document includes the names of individuals authorized to act on behalf of the company.

persons.name: Ramona F Vickers
persons.context: Ramona F Vickers is listed as an authorized signer for Requiro Scientia LLC's bank account, allowing her to execute transactions on behalf of the company.

persons.name: Brian L Vickers
persons.context: Brian L Vickers is also listed as an authorized signer for Requiro Scientia LLC's bank account, granting him the authority to manage the company's financial transactions.

keyFacts: The document establishes a deposit account for Requiro Scientia LLC at Fifth Third Bank.
Ramona F Vickers and Brian L Vickers are authorized to manage the company's bank accounts.
The resolution allows for various financial transactions including wire transfers and automated clearing house transactions.
The bank is authorized to rely on the resolution until notified of any changes.
The document indicates that Requiro Scientia LLC is an unincorporated business.
